title: 服务器崩了！求看崩服记录是什么原因导致的
author: Goodlucky31
txt_content:
服务器崩服，大神帮我看看是什么问题下面是崩服记录


[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: The server has stopped responding!
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and 

Minecraft crash reports
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Spigot version: git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b (MC: 

1.8.7)
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before 

reporting to Spigot!):
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Current Thread: Server thread
[15:15:58] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]:

replies.author: loveba_by
replies.txt_content: 核心错误  应该是核心不对吧

replies.author: Goodlucky31
replies.txt_content:
loveba_by 发表于 2016-1-24 22:51
核心错误  应该是核心不对吧
..什么核心？

replies.author: loveba_by
replies.txt_content: 你的服务器核心是MCPC+ 还是Spigot

replies.author: ESCesc
replies.txt_content: 服务器的jar文件错误。欢歌jar文件
